universum.studios.android.fragment.manage

Class FragmentItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • universum.studios.android.fragment.manage.FragmentItem

  • public final class FragmentItem
extends Object
    Item that is used by BaseFragmentFactory to instantiate new fragments that has been specified via @FactoryFragment annotation.
    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int id
      Fragment id specified for this item.
      String tag
      Fragment tag specified for this item.
      Class<? extends Fragment> type
      Fragment class specified for this item.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      FragmentItem(int id, Class<? extends Fragment> type)
      Same as FragmentItem(int, Class, String) with null tag.
      FragmentItem(int id, Class<? extends Fragment> type, String tag)
      Creates a new instance of FragmentItem with the given parameters.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Fragment newFragmentInstance(Bundle arguments)
      Creates a new instance of Fragment type of specified for this item.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • id

        public final int id
        Fragment id specified for this item.

      • type

        public final Class<? extends Fragment> type
        Fragment class specified for this item.

        public final String tag
        Fragment tag specified for this item.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FragmentItem

        public FragmentItem(int id,
                    @NonNull
                    Class<? extends Fragment> type)
        Same as FragmentItem(int, Class, String) with null tag.

      • FragmentItem

        public FragmentItem(int id,
                    @NonNull
                    Class<? extends Fragment> type,
                    @Nullable
                    String tag)
        Creates a new instance of FragmentItem with the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the fragment for the new item.
        type - Class of the fragment for the new item.
        tag - Tag of the fragment for the new item.

    • Method Detail

      • newFragmentInstance

        @Nullable
public Fragment newFragmentInstance(@Nullable
                                               Bundle arguments)
        Creates a new instance of Fragment type of specified for this item.
        Parameters:
        arguments - Arguments to be attached to the new Fragment instance via Fragment.setArguments(Bundle).
        Returns:
        New fragment instance or null if fragment type specified for this item is Fragment.class which is a default type and such type cannot be instantiated or some instantiation error occurs.
